JobFullDesc: As a Consultant you will be responsible for delivering high quality solutions and business outcomes based on Microsoft Azure.  You will have the opportunity to help us create & deliver the next generation of Azure-based Solutions for our most strategic customers.  Our Consulting team offers a collaborative culture where you can contribute your knowledge & experience while learning together as we create cutting-edge cloud solutions for our customers. ResponsibilitiesCustomer facing delivery of Azure cloud solutionsDemonstrate the ability to adapt to new technologies and learn quicklyAbility to deliver results through teamwork while achieving individual billable attainment goalsAbility to focus on customers, proven ability to be client focused, create results, proactive, and collaborate with othersDemonstrate a passion for mentoring, supporting peers & sharing knowledgeConsume and contribute best practices, lessons learned, and intellectual property (IP) to the global Microsoft community with a focus on continuous improvementFoster senior level client relationships and engage with senior level Microsoft and client stakeholders to drive solution successDisplay strong time, project, and priority management skillsExpress great communication skills, presentation skills, written skills, customer/partner relationships and expectations managementQualificationsYou will have a deep technical background with 7+ years of technology-related experience, along with 3+ years of Microsoft Azure, AWS or GCP experience.  You will have in depth expertise in one of the following functional areas: Cloud Development & Application Lifecycle Management: experience building solution architectures and implementing secure and scalable cloud-native applications and microservices using Agile/Scrum methodologiesDevOps & Infrastructure as Code – expertise with software collaboration and deployment tools such as Azure DevOps, GitHub and Jenkins.
